item.description:
Tim sent me an email telling me about this presentation given at Dickinson Memorial Library in Northfield, MA. It sounds fabulous to me and wondered if there may be some interest in this within our group. Tim tells me he thinks they have room for about 30 people and if they have a bigger response, may move this presentation to a local church.

The presentation begins at 6:30pm on Tuesday evening but it would be best to be there 15 minutes early to sit together if we can.

Here's the link to the library and their posting of this event.

http://northfieldpubliclibrary.org/

Please RSVP here by Tuesday afternoon at 12:45pm so that I can confirm with the library just how many seats we'll be filling.

Hopefully, this link will provide directions once you plug in your address.

http://goo.gl/maps/E33T
item.how_to_find_us: Will have a group Meet-up sign.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: (Presentation)The Creation of Quabbin Reservoir
